text: Judan kaba me arazir kurar avɨribagh ami, ezɨ bizir kam na gamima kɨ men anɨngaghe. Me asebar ziaba fe, egha ofan mɨgharir mughuriar aghuim zuiba me ganɨdi. Me fomɨra aser kabagh fozir puvatɨ. Ezɨ ia Judan kagh itiba, ko ian inazir afeziaba uaghan, ia bar moghɨra aser kabagh fozir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ Judan gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨki.
